Description: Gotham Men's Gold-Tone 17 Jewel Exhibition Mechanical Covered Pocket Watch # GWC14035G FEATURES Classic round gold-tone polished 17 jewel mechanical pocket watch suitable for engraving Intricately designed front cover opens to expose beautiful white Roman numeral dial with exhibition center to display movement and it's moving parts Rich antique style blue cobalt hour, minute and seconds hands plus scratch resistant mineral crystal Includes matching 15" curb pocket watch chain with spring ring attachment Arrives with deluxe draw string pouch and gift box, Selvyt polishing cloth, operating instructions and lifetime limited warranty card DESCRIPTION This classic and elegant gold-tone exhibition pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include an engravable solid brass case with push button opening, white Roman numeral dial with exposed mechanical movement, bold blue cobalt hands and a deluxe 15 inch curb link pocket watch chain with spring ring attachment to place on your belt loop. As always, your watch will arrive richly packaged in a beautiful box that includes instructions, our limited lifetime warranty plus a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep you timepiece in pristine condition.This is truly a great timepiece at the right price.
